name: WowieJam04
description:
This is my submission to the WowieJam04! witch had the theme: "Collaborate with AI"!!

Hope you like it :D

Edit: Noooo! i was super stressed when uploading the project so i wasn't able to playtest the final version (which is always a bad thing :P ). Soo i just noticed that, i forgot to reset a variable of the bot so it wont do anything as soon as you finish the tutorial :(. I am really sorry for that (and for the massive cursor.. how did that happen!? xd). Thanks for playing anyways!
